sourcesContent: import*as t from"react";import{Storage as s}from"@aws-amplify/storage";const e=(e,r)=>{const[i,a]=t.useState({isLoading:!0}),n=JSON.stringify(r),o=()=>{a({isLoading:!0});const t=s.get(e,r);return t.then((t=>a({url:t,isLoading:!1}))).catch((t=>a({error:t,isLoading:!1}))),()=>s.cancel(t)};return t.useEffect(o,[e,r,n]),Object.assign(Object.assign({},i),{fetch:o})};export{e as useStorageURL};
